current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To rescind amounts appropriated for fiscal year 2013 for
		  the Department of Defense for the Medium Extended Air Defense System, and for
		  other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read the first time

action-desc.#text:
Read the second time and placed on the
			 calendar

Read the second time and placed on the
		  calendar

header.#text:
Rescission of amounts for
			 fiscal year 2013 for the Department of Defense for the Medium Extended Air
			 Defense System

quote.#tail:
for the Medium Extended Air
			 Defense System (MEADS), namely $380,900,000, is hereby rescinded.

header-in-text.#text:
Research, Development,
			 Test and Evaluation, Army

text.#text:
The amount appropriated or otherwise made
			 available by

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
title IV of division C of the Consolidated and Further Continuing
			 Appropriations Act, 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013/d:C/t:IV

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is increased by $205,000,000, with the
			 amount to be allocated among accounts funded by that title in a manner
			 determined appropriate by the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
title II of division C of the Consolidated and Further
			 Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013/d:C/t:II

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
a report describing the allocation of funds among accounts pursuant
			 to this subsection.

header.#text:
Increase in
			 amount for Operation and Maintenance
